channel.title: Once click easy rsc thingy
channel.description:
ok so i got it all up and running and it works for a bit then i do seam to get this error.
java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException
i only get this error if i log off or get kicked off for not moving, and try to log back in. also when i try to log back in this error pops up but a new char pops up aswell with the same name as me but first letters missing, for example:
Testing123 << my char Esting123 << another char after i get error
and when i get the error it says unable to connect or chars logged in or it just goes black screen and waits there for a bit then back to login screen.. any ideas??

item.title: Once click easy rsc thingy
item.dc:creator: @beer123 beer123
item.description:
@beer123 wrote:

Maedie1:

xEnt, when you come out with the new version, how is it going to work? Right now, I’m hosting it and it works great. Thanks a lot for it. But when you come out with the new version all I’ll have to do is replace the IP, and transfer my char files?

yea and any files u changed bring them over so u dont have to edit them agian

Read full topic

item.title: Once click easy rsc thingy
item.dc:creator: @beer123 beer123
item.description:
@beer123 wrote:

ok so i got it all up and running and it works for a bit then i do seam to get this error.

java.lang.NullPointerException
java.lang.NullPointerException
java.lang.NullPointerException
java.lang.NullPointerException

i only get this error if i log off or get kicked off for not moving, and try to log back in. also when i try to log back in this error pops up but a new char pops up aswell with the same name as me but first letters missing, for example:

Testing123 << my char
Esting123 << another char after i get error

and when i get the error it says unable to connect or chars logged in or it just goes black screen and waits there for a bit then back to login screen… any ideas??
